thread.title: Tui reveals location of new concept store
thread.title_full: Tui reveals location of new concept store

title: Tui reveals location of new concept store
text:
Save 
Thomson is to open a new holiday design store in Westfield Bradford later this year, its new retail director has revealed. 
Speaking at the opening of the company’s new design store in Westfield Stratford, Jill Carter told TTG the company was fully committed to its retail footprint and would be opening the new design store in November. 
“Westfield will be opening around November time and we’ll be opening a new design store there too. 
She admitted that Thomson’s online strategy was still key but insisted that its high street presence remained significant. 
“Our retail footprint is integral to Thomson – look at the investment we are putting into the high street. The fact that we are investing significantly in the high street speaks volumes. 
It came as Carter officially opened the holiday design store in Westfield Stratford London, joined by customer operations director Fraser Ellacott and the mayor of Newham. 
It is the company’s first holiday design store in London and will have 50% of staff from the local area. 
“We really wanted a local presence,” Carter said. “I’m so passionate about the community that we work in whether here or overseas its so important to encourage local employment.”
